com.iLabs.spice.handler
Class ImageUploadHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.iLabs.pagecode.PageCodeBase
      com.iLabs.spice.handler.ImageUploadHandler

public class ImageUploadHandler
extends PageCodeBase

This class is used to handle functionality related to album like upload image,retrieve user album from services, process image for preview and delete image.

Author:
iLabs

public ImageUploadHandler()
Method Detail

getUploadRendered

public boolean getUploadRendered()
This function determines whether user can upload image or not. If the current profile being viewed is owner's profile then user can upload image.

Returns:
boolean which determines whether to render upload html component or not.

public void setUploadRendered(boolean uploadRendered)

getUserAlbumList

public java.util.Collection getUserAlbumList()
This function is used to fetch user album. It uses getPersonAlbum service to receive user images.

Returns:
Collection which contains list of user images.

setUserAlbumList

public void setUserAlbumList(java.util.Collection userAlbumList)
Setter for userAlbumList.

Parameters:
userAlbumList - Collection

processMyPhoto

public java.lang.String processMyPhoto()
This function is used to upload image. It creates a user directory for every user and resizes the image using saveCropedFile() function. It then saves the image using addToAlbum service.

Returns:
String
